metadata.name: 𝑷𝒓𝒊𝒄𝒆 𝒇𝒐𝒓 𝑰𝒏𝒅𝒆𝒑𝒆𝒏𝒅𝒆𝒏𝒄𝒆
metadata.description:
“We were having dinner with the family and at that moment our area of   the city was attacked by Russian missiles” - I think for many of us from Ukraine this is familiar.

With this art, I want to show that we are not afraid and are fighting for our independence, Ukraine cannot be broken, we will destroy Russian fascism.
What is happening now with us in Ukraine is the genocide of the Ukrainian people.  Every day Russian missiles destroy Ukrainian cities.
More than 3100 rockets (from one to five ton rockets), millions of shells, billions of cartridges.
Tens of thousands of civilians were killed and hundreds of thousands more lost their homes, 
it was destroyed.
We are fighting for freedom and independence, I am grateful to every country that helps us Ukrainians.  Many countries said that Ukraine would not last even three days, but we have been holding out for almost 200 days and are successfully destroying Russian fascists.  Putin's regime must be destroyed

Glory to Ukraine!
